sentences.sContent: Frankie’s a bit of a clown.
He clowned with John Belushi and Bill Murray in National Lampoon shows.
sentences.sCn: 他与约翰·贝鲁西和比尔·默里在全国讽刺作品表演会上一起扮演小丑。

synos.tran: 小丑；乡下人；粗鲁笨拙的人

trans.tranCn: 小丑；乡下人；粗鲁笨拙的人
trans.tranOther: someone who wears funny clothes, a red nose, bright  make-up  on their face etc, and does silly things to make people laugh, especially at a  circus
If you clown, you do silly things in order to make people laugh
